answers.answer: Good luck to you for these last couple of weeks. The 5th is my birthday. My baby is due that week as well. I know what you are going through with the hip and back pain. Luckily we are in the home stretch now.
I can't wait. it's a bitter sweet feeling since it's defiantly our last but he's our 3rd

question: We had our 30 week appt yesterday, I'll be 31 weeks in 2 days and we scheduled or c section for June 5 (day before hubby birthday). I am really crossing my fingers that he comes naturally by then. I think we have FINALLY picked out his name as well.this is our last and I am ready, I've had so much back and hip pain and trouble with my diabetes that it's not been too fun.
title: 8 more weeks!
